H0.text: Throw the cans in the trash is what Carmine's mother should do after drinking four cans of soft drink each day.

H1.text: Sending the cans to a landfill is what Carmine's mother should do after she drinks four cans of soft drink each day.

H2.text: Taking the cans to be recycled is what Carmine's mother should do after drinking the four cans of soft drink each day.

H3.text: Crushing the cans before putting them in the trash is what Carmine's mother should do after drinking four cans of soft drink each day.

A4.text: It also saves enough energy to power 1.5 million homes per year, and keeps more than 1 million tons of waste out of landfills every year.

A5.text: Recycling aluminium uses about 5% of the energy required to create aluminium from bauxite.
